article_title: Health-care providers tell R.I. legislative commission patients unable to pay bills, avoiding uncovered expenses
article_text: Sign up for our newsletter and have the top headlines from your community delivered right to your inbox

article_metadata.description: PROVIDENCE, R.I.  Insurance plans with soaring deductibles are leaving more and more patients unable to pay their medical bills. Or, worse, they simply aren’t seeking recommended care to avoid incurring uncovered expenses.
article_metadata.author: Richard Salit
